DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate how BLI-489 and piperacillin interact when given together to healthy subjects.
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating BLI-489 and Piperacillin in Healthy Subjects
DOC.criteria: 1. Men or women of nonchildbearing potential, aged 18 to 50 years of age inclusive at screening. 2. Body mass index (BMI) in the range of 18 to 32 kg/m2 and body weight greater than or equal to 50 kg. 3. Healthy as determined by the investigator on the basis of the screening evaluations. 4. Nonsmoker of smoker of fewer than 10 cigarettes per day as determined by history. 1. Presence of history of any disorder that may prevent the successful completion of the study. 2. History of drug abuse within 1 year.
